entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
